cantrips.name: Acid Splash
cantrips.short_description: Acid Splash is a cantrip (Conjuration). It deals Acid damage to enemies in a small area.

cantrips.name: Blade Ward
cantrips.short_description: Blade Ward is a cantrip (Abjuration). It allows spellcasters to become more resilient against physical damage.

cantrips.name: Bone Chill
cantrips.short_description: Bone Chill is a cantrip (Necromancy). It deals Necrotic damage and prevents the target from regaining Hit Points.

cantrips.name: Dancing Lights
cantrips.short_description: Dancing Lights is a cantrip (Evocation). It creates magical orbs of light that brighten an area.

cantrips.name: Eldritch Blast
cantrips.short_description: Eldritch Blast is a cantrip (Evocation). The cantrip allows the spellcaster to shoot out an energy beam that deals Force damage, and that can be upgraded with Warlock abilities.

cantrips.name: Fire Bolt
cantrips.short_description: Fire Bolt is a cantrip (Evocation). It allows the caster to hurl a bolt of fire at an enemy.

cantrips.name: Friends
cantrips.short_description: Friends is a cantrip (Enchantment). It makes the caster appear more charismatic to the affected creature.

cantrips.name: Guidance
cantrips.short_description: Guidance is a cantrip (Divination). This cantrip allows spellcasters to grant a temporary bonus to a creature's Ability Checks.

cantrips.name: Light
cantrips.short_description: Light is a cantrip (Evocation). It makes an object shed light in a small area.

cantrips.name: Mage Hand
cantrips.short_description: Mage Hand is a cantrip (Conjuration). It conjures a spectral hand that can interact with objects.

cantrips.name: Minor Illusion
cantrips.short_description: Minor Illusion is a cantrip (Illusion). It conjures a simple illusion to distract creatures.

cantrips.name: Poison Spray
cantrips.short_description: Poison Spray is a cantrip (Conjuration). This cantrip allows spellcasters to deal Poison damage to a target.

cantrips.name: Produce Flame
cantrips.short_description: Produce Flame is a cantrip (Conjuration). This cantrip creates a blue flame in the caster's palm that emanates light and can be thrown at enemies.

cantrips.name: Ray of Frost
cantrips.short_description: Ray of Frost is a cantrip (Evocation). It deals Cold damage to the target and slows it down.

cantrips.name: Resistance
cantrips.short_description: Resistance is a cantrip (Abjuration). This cantrip grants a temporary bonus to a creature's  Saving throws.

cantrips.name: Sacred Flame
cantrips.short_description: Sacred Flame is a cantrip (Evocation). It deals Radiant damage to a target.

cantrips.name: Shillelagh
cantrips.short_description: Shillelagh is a cantrip (Transmutation). It imbues the caster's weapon with nature power.

cantrips.name: Shocking Grasp
cantrips.short_description: Shocking Grasp is a cantrip (Evocation). It makes a melee attack that inflicts Lightning damage and prevents the target from taking Reactions.

cantrips.name: Thaumaturgy
cantrips.short_description: Thaumaturgy is a cantrip (Transmutation). It temporarily improves the caster's Intimidation and Performance checks.

cantrips.name: Thorn Whip
cantrips.short_description: Thorn Whip is a cantrip (Transmutation). It deals damage to a target and pulls it closer to the caster.

cantrips.name: True Strike
cantrips.short_description: True Strike is a cantrip (Divination). The caster gains Advantage on their next Attack Roll against the target.

cantrips.name: Vicious Mockery
cantrips.short_description: Vicious Mockery is a cantrip (Enchantment). It deals Psychic damage to enemies and inflicts Disadvantage on their Attack Rolls.

spells.name: Animal Friendship
spells.short_description: Animal Friendship is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell charms a beast and convinces it you mean no harm.

spells.name: Armour of Agathys
spells.short_description: Armour of Agathys is a level 1 abjuration spell. It allows spellcasters to create a spectral armour of frost that covers the caster and their equipment. The armour provides additional Hit Points to the caster and damages hostile targets while the added Hit Points are present.

spells.name: Arms of Hadar
spells.short_description: Arms of Hadar is a level 1 conjuration spell. This spell allows the caster to summon dark tendrils and deal Necrotic damage to enemies in an area centered on the caster, preventing them from taking  Reactions.

spells.name: Bane
spells.short_description: Bane is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows the caster to temporarily curse enemies, making their attacks miss more often and weakening their Saving Throws.

spells.name: Bless
spells.short_description: Bless is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily bolster themselves and their allies‚Äô attacks and Saving Throws.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.short_description: Burning Hands is a level 1 evocation spell. It allows spellcasters to shoot a flaming cone from their fingertips and deal Fire damage to enemies.

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.short_description: Charm Person is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily charm a humanoid creature, granting Advantage on Charisma Checks.

spells.name: Chromatic Orb
spells.short_description: Chromatic Orb is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to fire a ball of energy and deal the desired damage type to enemies.

spells.name: Colour Spray
spells.short_description: Colour Spray is a level 1 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily blind enemies with flashing coloured light, making their attacks miss more often and shortening their attack range.

spells.name: Command
spells.short_description: Command is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to order their target to flee, move closer, freeze, drop to the ground, or drop their weapon.

spells.name: Compelled Duel
spells.short_description: Compelled Duel is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to compel an enemy to ignore other targets and attack only the spellcaster.

spells.name: Create or Destroy Water
spells.short_description: Create or Destroy Water is a level 1 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure or destroy an area of water (or water-like surfaces).

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.short_description: Cure Wounds is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heal allies with divine magic through touch.

spells.name: Disguise Self
spells.short_description: Disguise Self is a level 1 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance. While active, gain access to the action ¬†Dispel Disguise to end the effect.

spells.name: Dissonant Whispers
spells.short_description: Dissonant Whispers is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to fill a target with terror and deal Psychic damage to them.

spells.name: Divine Favour
spells.short_description: Divine Favour is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to empower their Weapons to deal extra Radiant damage.

spells.name: Enhance Leap
spells.short_description: Enhance Leap is a level 1 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to increase a creature's Jumping distance.

spells.name: Ensnaring Strike
spells.short_description: Ensnaring Strike is a level 1 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to use weapon attacks to ensnare enemies with thorny vines and deal Piercing damage to them each turn.

spells.name: Entangle
spells.short_description: Entangle is a level 1 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure magical vines and turn an area within range into difficult terrain. Creatures are possibly ¬†Entangled and move at half speed while standing in this area.

spells.name: Expeditious Retreat
spells.short_description: Expeditious Retreat is a level 1 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to move more swiftly.

spells.name: Faerie Fire
spells.short_description: Faerie Fire is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure brilliant light. Any creature caught in the radius temporarily sheds faint light and prevents ¬†Invisible.

spells.name: False Life
spells.short_description: False Life is a level 1 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to gain Temporary Hit Points.

spells.name: Feather Fall
spells.short_description: Feather Fall is a level 1 transmutation spell. It allows spellcasters to make themselves and their allies light as a feather, preventing them from taking damage when falling from extreme heights.

spells.name: Find Familiar
spells.short_description: Find Familiar is a level 1 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a fey familiar that can aid them in combat or world exploration.

spells.name: Fog Cloud
spells.short_description: Fog Cloud is a level 1 conjuration spell. It allows spellcasters to summon a sphere of fog on an area in range and heavily obscure the area. Creatures within the area are Blinded.

spells.name: Goodberry
spells.short_description: Goodberry is a level 1 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to create magical berries which have healing properties when eaten.

spells.name: Grease
spells.short_description: Grease is a level 1 conjuration spell. It allows spellcasters to conjure flammable grease on the ground within range and turn it into Difficult Terrain.

spells.name: Guiding Bolt
spells.short_description: Guiding Bolt is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to hit enemies with radiant bolt that deals Radiant damage and grants advantage to attack rolls made against them.

spells.name: Hail of Thorns
spells.short_description: Hail of Thorns is a level 1 conjuration spell. This spell allows the caster to make a ranged attack that creates a Piercing damage explosion in addition to dealing normal weapon damage.

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.short_description: Healing Word is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heal allies that they can see within range.

spells.name: Hellish Rebuke
spells.short_description: Hellish Rebuke is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to surround a creature in hellfire that deals Fire damage as a Reaction when taking damage from them.

spells.name: Heroism
spells.short_description: Heroism is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to instill themselves or an ally with courage. The affected creature cannot be ¬†Frightened and gains Temporary Hit Points.

spells.name: Hex
spells.short_description: Hex is a level 1 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to put a curse on a creature and deal additional Necrotic damage to the targeted creature. The curse also imposes Disadvantage on a chosen ability check.

spells.name: Hunter's Mark
spells.short_description: Hunter's Mark is a level 1 divination spell. This spell allows spellcasters to mark a creature as their prey and deal additional Weapon damage to the targeted creature.

spells.name: Ice Knife
spells.short_description: Ice Knife is a level 1 conjuration spell. The caster throws a shard of ice, which explodes and leaves behind an icy surface.

spells.name: Inflict Wounds
spells.short_description: Inflict Wounds is a level 1 necromancy spell. This spell allows the spellcaster to make a melee attack that inflicts Necrotic damage.

spells.name: Longstrider
spells.short_description: Longstrider is a level 1 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to make a creature move farther during a turn.

spells.name: Mage Armour
spells.short_description: Mage Armour is a level 1 abjuration spell. This spell allows  spellcasters to surround an unarmoured creature (including themselves if they're unarmoured) with magical protection.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.short_description: Magic Missile is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to hit enemies with multiple projectiles that deal Force damage.

spells.name: Protection from Evil and Good
spells.short_description: Protection from Evil and Good is a level 1 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to surround themselves with magical protection against Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead.

spells.name: Ray of Sickness
spells.short_description: Ray of Sickness is a level 1 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to hit enemies with a ray of nauseating energy that deals Poison damage, and potentially Poisons them.

spells.name: Sanctuary
spells.short_description: Sanctuary is a level 1 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to ward themselves or an ally against enemy attacks.

spells.name: Searing Smite
spells.short_description: Searing Smite is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to cause their melee weapon to flare with white-hot intensity, searing their targets on hit.

spells.name: Shield
spells.short_description: Shield is a level 1 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to avoid being hit by an enemy attack at the last possible instant. It also completely nullifies Magic Missile.

spells.name: Shield of Faith
spells.short_description: Shield of Faith is a level 1 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to surround themselves or an ally with divine protection and gain a bonus to their Armour Class.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.short_description: Sleep is a level 1 enchantment spell. It allows the spellcaster to temporarily make conscious creatures fall into a deep slumber.

spells.name: Speak with Animals
spells.short_description: Speak with Animals is a level 1 divination spell. This spell allows spellcasters to understand and talk to beasts and animals for a day.

spells.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
spells.short_description: Tasha's Hideous Laughter is a level 1 enchantment spell. It allows spellcasters to send a targeted creature into a fit of laughter, falling ¬†Prone.

spells.name: Thunderous Smite
spells.short_description: Thunderous Smite is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to cause their melee weapon to ring with Thunder as they strike, pushing targets away and potentially knocking them ¬†Prone.

spells.name: Thunderwave
spells.short_description: Thunderwave is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to project out a deafening force that can hit multiple creatures and objects. Creatures hit by this force are potentially pushed away from the spellcaster.

spells.name: Witch Bolt
spells.short_description: Witch Bolt is a level 1 evocation spell. It allows spellcasters to hit enemies with a blue ray of electrifying energy that deals Lightning damage to them initially and also on subsequent turns.

spells.name: Wrathful Smite
spells.short_description: Wrathful Smite is a level 1 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to channel their wrath through their melee weapon, possibly ¬†Frightening their target on hit.

spells.name: Aid
spells.short_description: Aid is a level 2 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heal and embolden their allies and themselves with resolve. Affected creatures have their maximum Hit Points increased for the duration of the spell.

spells.name: Arcane Lock
spells.short_description: Arcane Lock is a level 2 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to magically lock a container.

spells.name: Barkskin
spells.short_description: Barkskin is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to fortify the defense of a willing creature and increase their Armour Class. While under the effect of this spell, the target's skin has a bark-like texture.

spells.name: Blindness
spells.short_description: Blindness is a level 2 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to magically ¬†Blind a targeted hostile creature.

spells.name: Blur
spells.short_description: Blur is a level 2 illusion spell. This spell Blurs the spellcaster's body and makes them harder to hit.

spells.name: Branding Smite
spells.short_description: Branding Smite is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to cause their weapon to gleam with astral radiance, allow them to mark targets with light, preventing them from turning ¬†Invisible

spells.name: Calm Emotions
spells.short_description: Calm Emotions is a level 2 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to magically subdue intense emotions in targeted creatures. The affected target becomes neutral to the creatures it is hostile toward. It also cannot be Charmed or Frightened during the duration of the spell.

spells.name: Cloud of Daggers
spells.short_description: Cloud of Daggers is a level 2 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a barrage of daggers in an area that deals Slashing damage to any creature entering or starting its turn in the area.

spells.name: Crown of Madness
spells.short_description: Crown of Madness is a level 2 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily charm a humanoid creature and induce madness in their mind. The affected creature will make a melee attack against any creature within its reach.

spells.name: Darkness
spells.short_description: Darkness is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a cloud of darkness in an area within range that obscures and inflicts ¬†blind to those within it.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.short_description: Darkvision is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to alter a creature's sight, granting them the ability to see in the dark.

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.short_description: Detect Thoughts is a level 2 divination spell. This spell allows spellcasters to telepathically link to unprotected minds and hear the thoughts of targeted creatures while talking to them.

spells.name: Enhance Ability
spells.short_description: Enhance Ability is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to strengthen an aspect of a creature's physical or mental attributes.

spells.name: Enlarge/Reduce
spells.short_description: Enlarge/Reduce is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to alter a creature's body size. The caster can choose to double or halve the size of the affected creature.

spells.name: Enthrall
spells.short_description: Enthrall is a level 2 enchantment spell. This spells allows spellcasters to capture the attention of a creature, forcing the creature to focus on them.

spells.name: Flame Blade
spells.short_description: Flame Blade is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a fiery scimitar in their free hand that sheds bright light. Casters can make a melee weapon attack with the blade to deal Fire damage to enemies.

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.short_description: Flaming Sphere is a level 2 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a Flaming Sphere that can attack and burn enemies.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.short_description: Gust of Wind is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a squall to clear dangerous gasses or throw creatures back, potentially causing a dangerous fall.

spells.name: Heat Metal
spells.short_description: Heat Metal is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heat up a metal weapon or armour on the targeted creature, forcing them to let go or receive damage or suffer various penalties.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.short_description: Hold Person is a level 2 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to hold a target humanoid in place. The affected creature is unable to move and act and is much more susceptible to attacks.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.short_description: Invisibility is a level 2 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to turn themselves and other creatures ¬†Invisible to the naked eye.

spells.name: Knock
spells.short_description: Knock is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to unlock non-magical locks.

spells.name: Lesser Restoration
spells.short_description: Lesser Restoration is a level 2 abjuration spell. This spell allows the spellcaster to cure an adjacent creature.

spells.name: Magic Weapon
spells.short_description: Magic Weapon is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to infuse a weapon with arcane energy, making it magical.

spells.name: Melf's Acid Arrow
spells.short_description: Melf's Acid Arrow is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to shoot a magical arrow that deals Acid damage to a target on impact and at the end of its next turn.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.short_description: Mirror Image is a level 2 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to create 3 illusory duplicates of themselves to distract attackers.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.short_description: Misty Step is a level 2 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to teleport themselves to an unoccupied space that they can see.

spells.name: Moonbeam
spells.short_description: Moonbeam is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to call down a beam of moonlight that deals Radiant damage to any creature that enters the beam or starts its turn there.

spells.name: Pass Without Trace
spells.short_description: Pass Without Trace is a level 2 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to grants themselves and nearby allies a bonus to Stealth Checks.

spells.name: Phantasmal Force
spells.short_description: Phantasmal Force is a level 2 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to flood a target creature's mind with an illusion of the last thing that attacked it, dealing 1d6Psychic damage per turn, changing to the last type of damage inflicted upon the target.

spells.name: Prayer of Healing
spells.short_description: Prayer of Healing is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heal all allies within range.

spells.name: Protection from Poison
spells.short_description: Protection from Poison is a level 2 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch protection from Poisonous effects.

spells.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
spells.short_description: Ray of Enfeeblement is a level 2 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to make a ranged spell attack against a creature and sap their Strength. A weakened creature deals half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.short_description: Scorching Ray is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to hurl 3 rays of fire at targets within range. You can either target a single creature or multiple creatures with the rays. Each ray rolls a separate Attack Roll and deals Fire damage.

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.short_description: See Invisibility is a level 2 divination spell. This spell allows spellcasters to see ¬†Invisible objects and creatures within range while not ¬†Incapacitated. Creatures within range which fail on a Dexterity Saving Throw are revealed to others.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.short_description: Shatter is a level 2 evocation spell. This spell allows the spellcaster to generate a deafening noise explosion that can damage multiple creatures and objects. This spell is extra potent against inorganic targets, who must make their Saving Throw at Disadvantage.

spells.name: Silence
spells.short_description: Silence is a level 2 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a sphere of absolute quietness in an area within range. Creatures within this sphere are immune to Thunder damage and cannot cast verbal spells.

spells.name: Spike Growth
spells.short_description: Spike Growth is a level 2 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to transform an area of land into a hazardous spiky terrain. Creatures walking through the area have their speed halved and take Piercing damage.

spells.name: Spiritual Weapon
spells.short_description: Spiritual Weapon is a level 2 evocation spell. Summons a floating weapon that can attack enemies. You can choose between several different weapons, and each has a different Weapon Action.

spells.name: Warding Bond
spells.short_description: Warding Bond is a level 2 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to bolster an ally's defenses while also sharing any damage they receive.

spells.name: Web
spells.short_description: Web is a level 2 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a mass of sticky and flammable web at an area within range. Creatures moving or entering this area have their speed halved and can become Enwebbed.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.short_description: Animate Dead is a level 3 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to animate a corpse to create an undead servant.

spells.name: Beacon of Hope
spells.short_description: Beacon of Hope is a level 3 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to bolster their allies with hope and vitality.

spells.name: Bestow Curse
spells.short_description: Bestow Curse is a level 3 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to curse a target with their touch.

spells.name: Blinding Smite
spells.short_description: Blinding Smite is a level 3 evocation spell. Blinding Smite allows a Paladin to expend a Spell Slot to deal additional Radiant damage with a melee weapon attack and possibly blind their target.

spells.name: Blink
spells.short_description: Blink is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell allows the spellcaster to travel to the Ethereal Plane, becoming temporarily unassailable and unseen until they return.

spells.name: Call Lightning
spells.short_description: Call Lightning is a level 3 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to call down lightning to hit all targets within range. The spellcaster can also continue to call down lightning repeatedly on subsequent turns.

spells.name: Conjure Barrage
spells.short_description: Conjure Barrage is a level 3 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a barrage of blades in front of them, potentially hitting multiple enemies.

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.short_description: Counterspell is a level 3 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to interrupt another caster's spellcasting, causing it to fail and have no effect.

spells.name: Crusader's Mantle
spells.short_description: Crusader's Mantle is a level 3 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to imbue their allies' weapons with holy power, causing them to deal additional Radiant damage.

spells.name: Daylight
spells.short_description: Daylight is a level 3 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to dispel darkness by summoning a sphere of light or enchanting an item to shine like the sun.

spells.name: Elemental Weapon
spells.short_description: Elemental Weapon is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell imbues a weapon with a chosen energy type, increasing its damage and accuracy.

spells.name: Fear
spells.short_description: Fear is a level 3 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to terrify targets by projecting phantasmal images.

spells.name: Feign Death
spells.short_description: Feign Death is a level 3 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to put their allies into a magical, protective coma, feigning death.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.short_description: Fireball is a level 3 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to unleash a streak of fire from their hands that ignites into a large explosion at a chosen point within range.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.short_description: Gaseous Form is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to transform themselves or an ally into a cloud of mist to avoid attacks, reduce size, and gain Advantage on some Saving Throws.

spells.name: Glyph of Warding
spells.short_description: Glyph of Warding is a level 3 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to inscribe a ward that can trigger various magical effects when stepped on by an enemy.

spells.name: Grant Flight
spells.short_description: Grant Flight is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch the ability to fly.

spells.name: Haste
spells.short_description: Haste is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to allow their allies to become ¬†Hastened.

spells.name: Hunger of Hadar
spells.short_description: Hunger of Hadar is a level 3 conjuration spell. It creates an area that deals damage and inflicts conditions to creatures in it, including reduced movement speed.

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.short_description: Hypnotic Pattern is a level 3 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to hypnotise all creatures within an area.

spells.name: Lightning Arrow
spells.short_description: Lightning Arrow is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to fire an arrow of electricity that bursts on impact, dealing additional Lightning damage to creatures in the vicinity.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.short_description: Lightning Bolt is a level 3 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to discharge a bolt of lightning in any direction, potentially hitting multiple creatures.

spells.name: Mass Healing Word
spells.short_description: Mass Healing Word is a level 3 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heal several allies that they can see within range.

spells.name: Plant Growth
spells.short_description: Plant Growth is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to cause an area to expel weeds from the ground, quartering the movement speed of all creatures travelling through the area.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.short_description: Protection from Energy is a level 3 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch Resistance to an element of their choice.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.short_description: Remove Curse is a level 3 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to remove all curses afflicting a target through touch.

spells.name: Revivify
spells.short_description: Revivify is a level 3 necromancy spell. This spell allows the spellcaster to bring a dead Companion back to life.

spells.name: Sleet Storm
spells.short_description: Sleet Storm is a level 3 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to call forth a storm that douses fire, creates an Ice Surface, and disrupts the Concentration of spellcasters.

spells.name: Slow
spells.short_description: Slow is a level 3 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to reduce movement speed, Armour Class, and Dexterity Saving Throws, and limit actions.

spells.name: Speak with Dead
spells.short_description: Speak with Dead is a level 3 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to grant a semblance of life to a corpse, allowing it to answer questions.

spells.name: Spirit Guardians
spells.short_description: Spirit Guardians is a level 3 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to call forth spirits to damage nearby targets and slow their Movement.

spells.name: Stinking Cloud
spells.short_description: Stinking Cloud is a level 3 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to create a nauseating cloud of gas that can prevent creatures from taking Actions. Targets must make Constitution  Saving throws every turn while they're in the area of effect or become ¬†Nauseous.

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.short_description: Vampiric Touch is a level 3 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters at melee range to siphon the life force of their target.

spells.name: Warden of Vitality
spells.short_description: Warden of Vitality is a level 3 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heal allies repeatedly with ¬†Restore Vitality using only Bonus Actions for 10 turns.

spells.name: Banishment
spells.short_description: Banishment is a level 4 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily send a target to another plane of existence.

spells.name: Blight
spells.short_description: Blight is a level 4 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to drain the moisture and vitality from a target creature using necromantic energy. It's especially effective versus plants.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.short_description: Confusion is a level 4 enchantment spell. This spell allows the caster to confuse a group of creatures, drastically reducing their effectiveness in combat.

spells.name: Conjure Minor Elemental
spells.short_description: Conjure Minor Elemental is a level 4 conjuration spell. Conjure 2 Mud Mephits, 2 Ice Mephits, or an Azer to fight for you. Note that each caster is only able to have one instance of this active at a time no matter which version was chosen. Casting it a second time will despawn the currently active elemental(s), and BE WARNED, the Ice and Mud Mephits will fire their Death Burst if this happens which can harm your own party members. Note that this is considered independent of Conjure Elemental, each caster can have one instance of Elemental and Minor Elemental active simultaneously.

spells.name: Conjure Woodland Being
spells.short_description: Conjure Woodland Being is a level 4 conjuration spell. This spell summons a Dryad to fight alongside the caster.

spells.name: Death Ward
spells.short_description: Death Ward is a level 4 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to prevent a target from dying.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.short_description: Dimension Door is a level 4 conjuration spell. This spell teleports you and an ally.

spells.name: Dominate Beast
spells.short_description: Dominate Beast is a level 4 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily charm a Beast into fighting alongside the caster, rather than against them.

spells.name: Evard's Black Tentacles
spells.short_description: Evard's Black Tentacles is a level 4 conjuration spell. Summons tentacles in an area that make it difficult to move and harm creatures.

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.short_description: Fire Shield is a level 4 evocation spell. This spell shields the spellcaster with luminous energy.

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.short_description: Freedom of Movement is a level 4 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to imbue an ally with the ability to avoid some slowing effects.

spells.name: Grasping Vine
spells.short_description: Grasping Vine is a level 4 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a Grasping Vine which can pull enemies toward itself.

spells.name: Greater Invisibility
spells.short_description: Greater Invisibility is a level 4 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to provide a more resilient form of Invisibility for their allies.

spells.name: Guardian of Faith
spells.short_description: Guardian of Faith is a level 4 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a divine guardian who sacrifices its Hit Points to damage enemies.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.short_description: Ice Storm is a level 4 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon an ice storm to strike an area.

spells.name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
spells.short_description: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere is a level 4 evocation spell.

spells.name: Phantasmal Killer
spells.short_description: Phantasmal Killer is a level 4 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily haunt a creatures mind with illusions, dealing damage, prevents movement, and has Disadvantage on Ability Checks and Attack Rolls.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.short_description: Polymorph is a level 4 transmutation spell. This spell transforms a creature into a sheep.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.short_description: Stoneskin is a level 4 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to harden the skin of their ally, granting them Resistance to non-magical physical damage.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.short_description: Wall of Fire is a level 4 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to create a long, fiery barrier, damaging anything in the area.

spells.name: Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War
spells.short_description: Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War is a level 5 evocation spell. Fires multiple projectiles that deal Force damage. Can only be cast once per short rest.

spells.name: Banishing Smite
spells.short_description: Banishing Smite is a level 5 abjuration spell. This spells allows spellcasters to imbue their weapon with power, dealing force damage and possibly ¬†Banishing the target.

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.short_description: Cloudkill is a level 5 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a moveable cloud that damages and obscures everything it envelops.

spells.name: Cone of Cold
spells.short_description: Cone of Cold is a level 5 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to blast icy air into a region in front of them, damaging affected creatures and turning existing water surfaces into Ice Surfaces.

spells.name: Conjure Elemental
spells.short_description: Conjure Elemental is a level 5 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a Fire, Earth, Water, or Air Elemental. Note that each individual caster can have only one active instance of this at a time no matter which of the four elements was chosen, casting it again while an Elemental is already out will despawn the existing one. It is independent of Conjure Minor Elemental, the same caster can have one instance of an Elemental and a Minor Elemental active simultaneously.

spells.name: Contagion
spells.short_description: Contagion is a level 5 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to infect their target with an affliction of their choosing, potentially resulting in the target contracting a disease.

spells.name: Destructive Wave
spells.short_description: Destructive Wave is a level 5 evocation spell. This spell allows the caster to create a massive shockwave that damages all creatures and can possibly knock them prone.

spells.name: Dethrone
spells.short_description: Dethrone is a level 5 necromancy spell. Deals Necrotic damage to one enemy. Can only be cast once per Long Rest.

spells.name: Dispel Evil and Good
spells.short_description: Dispel Evil and Good is a level 5 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to protect themselves from Evil and Good creatures, and allows them to break Enchantments on allies.

spells.name: Dominate Person
spells.short_description: Dominate Person is a level 5 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to force a humanoid to temporarily fight as an ally.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.short_description: Flame Strike is a level 5 evocation spell. This spell allows the caster to make a pillar of divine flame at a chosen location dealing  5d6 Fire damage and 5d6 Radiant damage.

spells.name: Greater Restoration
spells.short_description: Greater Restoration is a level 5 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to removes Charm, Petrification, Stun, and Curses from a creature.

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.short_description: Hold Monster is a level 5 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to Paralyse a creature, preventing them from acting and making them vulnerable to attacks.

spells.name: Insect Plague
spells.short_description: Insect Plague is a level 5 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to create a damaging, debilitating swarm of insects over a section of the battlefield.

spells.name: Mass Cure Wounds
spells.short_description: Mass Cure Wounds is a level 5 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to heal several of their allies.

spells.name: Planar Binding
spells.short_description: Planar Binding is a level 5 abjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to take control of a Celestial, Elemental, Fey, or Fiend.

spells.name: Seeming
spells.short_description: Seeming is a level 5 illusion spell. This spell allows spellcasters to disguise their allies.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.short_description: Telekinesis is a level 5 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to throw creatures and objects around with only their mind.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.short_description: Wall of Stone is a level 5 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to create a solid stone barrier.

spells.name: Arcane Gate
spells.short_description: Arcane Gate is a level 6 conjuration spell.

spells.name: Blade Barrier
spells.short_description: Blade Barrier is a level 6 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a wall of cutting blades.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.short_description: Chain Lightning is a level 6 evocation spell.

spells.name: Circle of Death
spells.short_description: Circle of Death is a level 6 necromancy spell.

spells.name: Create Undead
spells.short_description: Create Undead is a level 6 necromancy spell.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.short_description: Disintegrate is a level 6 transmutation spell.

spells.name: Eyebite
spells.short_description: Eyebite is a level 6 necromancy spell.

spells.name: Flesh to Stone
spells.short_description: Flesh to Stone is a level 6 transmutation spell. Atrophy a foe, ¬†Restraining them until they temporarily turn to stone.

spells.name: Globe of Invulnerability
spells.short_description: Globe of Invulnerability is a level 6 abjuration spell.

spells.name: Harm
spells.short_description: Harm is a level 6 necromancy spell. This spell allows spellcasters to make an enemy much more feeble.

spells.name: Heal
spells.short_description: Heal is a level 6 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to substantially heal a target by recovering Hit Points and removing Diseases.

spells.name: Heroes' Feast
spells.short_description: Heroes' Feast is a level 6 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon a bountiful smorgasbord to bolster themselves and their allies and strengthen their resolve.

spells.name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
spells.short_description: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere is a level 6 evocation spell.

spells.name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
spells.short_description: Otto's Irresistible Dance is a level 6 enchantment spell. This spell allows spellcasters to force a creature to stay in place, inactive.

spells.name: Planar Ally
spells.short_description: Planar Ally is a level 6 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to summon an Elemental, Celestial, or Fiend for aid.

spells.name: Sunbeam
spells.short_description: Sunbeam is a level 6 evocation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to project a beam of light, Blinding and dealing Radiant damage to everything in its path. You can then use ¬†Recast Sunbeam on subsequent turns without expending a Spell Slot.

spells.name: Wall of Ice
spells.short_description: Wall of Ice is a level 6 evocation spell. It creates a wall of ice that deals strong Cold damage to anyone nearby.

spells.name: Wall of Thorns
spells.short_description: Wall of Thorns is a level 6 conjuration spell. This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a wall of brambles, Entangling and damaging any creatures who are in the area, or trying to pass through.

spells.name: Wind Walk
spells.short_description: Wind Walk is a level 6 transmutation spell. This spell allows spellcasters to transform a group of allies into a cloud of mist. This form offers damage Resistance, Advantage on some Saving Throws, and the ability to Fly.
